Title: Relates to the Chisholm Chance Act; repealer
Summary: Relates to the Chisholm Chance Act; creates centers of maternal and childcare services in Kings county and Bronx county to coordinate community-based organizations and community health workers to combat the maternal health crisis.
LawCode: Rpld & add Art 25 Title 3 §§2560 - 2563, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the maternal health crisis and establishing two centers of maternal and childcare services; and to repeal title 3 of article 25 of such law relating to the control of midwifery
